id.description: The unique identifier for the event.

startDate.description: The start date and time of the event.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the database entry for the event was created.

slug.description: The unique slug for the event which is used in the URL to access the event from the client.

rsvpToken.description: The token used to have permission to view and submit RSVPs to the event.

creatorId.description: The id of the user who created the event.
